title: History of South Africa: A Comprehensive Overview
author: Smith; John
summary: Comprehensive overview of South African history from pre-colonial times to the present day. Covers political; social; and economic developments with extensive primary source citations.

title: The Long Walk: A Novel
author: Molefe; Sarah
summary: A powerful story of resilience and hope set during the apartheid era. Follows three generations of a family navigating political and social change.

title: Nursing Fundamentals: Basic Nursing Care
author: Van der Berg; Anna|Nkosi; Peter
summary: Essential guide for nursing students covering fundamental nursing practices; patient care; and professional standards. Updated with latest clinical guidelines.

title: African Music Traditions
author: Various Authors
summary: Survey of traditional African music across the continent with focus on Southern African traditions. Includes transcriptions and recordings.

title: Agricultural Development in Southern Africa
author: Department of Agriculture
summary: Policy document on farming practices and agricultural development strategies for Southern African countries. Includes sustainability recommendations.
